description:
The masterpiece of physics puzzles, "Q" is coming to Nintendo Switch™!
This is a game of solving in the form you drew.
It contains more than 1,200 very simple but not straightforward Qs.
All the ways to solve it are open-ended!

Can you get the ball out of the glass?
Can you hit the ball to the wall?
Don't know what I'm talking about?
If you're confident, by all means give it a shot!

【New Stage】
The new 20-question "HELL" stage included only in this title is the most difficult ever!
The author has not yet been able to clear all the questions, making it the most difficult stage ever!
You will be one of the first in the world!

【Easy to draw】
The most playable Q to date with improved touch controls.
Gyro and button controls are also supported, allowing the game to be enjoyed in TV mode or table mode.
name: Q REMASTERED
intro:
Infinite number of ways to solve it.
Both adults and children can get into it.
